channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024020532
item.description:
Report X-2024020532

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DURING THE SORTING PROCESS OF A 2DA UPS PACKAGE SHIPPED USING A PADDED USPS PRIORITY BUBBLE MAILER, WE FELT THE SHAPE OF AND COULD HEAR AN AEROSOL TYPE PRODUCT INSIDE. THE THERMAL TRACKING LABEL ALSO SHOWED A DESCRIPTION OF DUST-OFF GAS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THERE ARE TWO X 10 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF DUST-OFF DUSTER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BUBBLE MAILER. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM CALIFORNIA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 87E746, APPLE TRADE-IN RETURNS - WC, 3011 LAGUNA BLVD., ELK GROVE CA 95758-7412.

item.title: Report X-2024020423
item.description:
Report X-2024020423

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-21
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Cap on bottle of LYSOLÂ® Mold & Mildew Remover With Bleach was cracked and leaking. No inner packing. Liquid had soaked other, non-hazardous contents in the box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2024020568
item.description:
Report X-2024020568

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RMP BROUGHT OVER A PACKAGE TO THE PSC. IT WAS DETERMINED THE PACKAGE WAS POSSIBLY AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT BECAUSE INSIDE THE BOX WAS A BUCKET WITH A LIMITED QUANTITY STICKER, BUT THERE WAS NO LIMITED QUANTITY STICKER ON THE EXTERNAL PACKAGING. RESPONDER CALLED HMSC WHO CONFIRMED IT WAS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. PUT ON HOLD FOR ADG COMPLIANCE. POLYAMINES, LIQUID, CORROSIVE, N.O.S. PART B - ENVIRONMENTALLY HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCES, LIQUID PART A (NOT REGULATED NON BULK)

item.title: Report X-2024020564
item.description:
Report X-2024020564

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: SALEM
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CLERK WHILE PUTTING A NEW REPLACEMENT LABEL ON THE PACKAGE, NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS RATTLING AND SUSPECTED AN AEROSOL CAN OF SOME KIND AND HELD PACKAGE FOR AUDITOR TO REVIEW. AFTER CONTACTING HMMS REPRESENTATIVE, IT WAS DETERMINED TO BE A CAN OF SPRAY PAINT AND WAS AN UNDECLARED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL PACKAGE. ALL DOCUMENTATION SUBMITTED AND ENTERED BY AUDITOR AND HMMS REPRESENTATIVE.

item.description:
Report X-2024020563

  • City: PORTLAND

  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE IN THE SORT; NO LEAK TO AEROSOLS. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND PACKAGE WITH POSSIBLE UNDECLARED. RESPONDER CONTACTED HMSC TO VERIFY UNDECLARED AEROSOLS.

item.title: Report X-2024020230
item.description:
Report X-2024020230

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Jug of herbicide was sideways in box, there was not enough room for it to be right side up in the box so we may conclude it was shipped sideways. Cap was taped shut but was also directly against the side of the box with no padding. While paper inner packing was included it was only to either side of the jug. Inspection revealed jug was leaking from the cap, which did not appear to be loose. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed right side up in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area. However being right side up surely did not help and jug was sideways in box, though this fact was not known at the time.

DescribePack: PRODUCT VENTED FROM THE CLOSURE ABOUT THE SIZE OF A STANDARD MILK JUG CLOSURE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RAPICIDE WAS PLACED IN PLASTIC TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.
